choose_the_plan_that_works_for_you_no_hi: 选择适合您的方案。没有隐藏费用。
dictate_four_times_faster_using_your_voi: 使用语音听写，速度快四倍。
here_s_a_really_long_sentence_that_i_hav: 这是一个非常长的句子，我必须把它打出來，而且它一直延续下去。
install_voquill_on_macos_windows_or_linu: 在 macOS、Windows 或 Linux 上安裝 Voquill，今天就开始使用 AI 听写。
installer_for_all_macos_architectures: 适用于所有 macOS 操作系统的安装程序
make_voice_your_new_keyboard: 让语音成为您的新键盘。
make_voice_your_new_keyboard_type_four_t: 让语音成为您的新键盘。使用语言打字快四倍。Voquill 是 WisprFlow 的开源替代方案。
one_voice_every_app: 一个声音。每个应用程序。
other_dictation_tools_send_your_audio_st: Other dictation tools send your audio straight to the cloud. Voquill can run entirely on your device — your words never leave your machine. Airplane mode, off the grid, wherever. It just works.
process_everything_locally_on_your_devic: Process everything locally on your device, bring your own API key, or connect to our cloud. Don't believe us? See for yourself. Voquill is fully open-source.
sorry_we_couldn_t_find_that_page: 抱歉，我们找不到该页面。
type_four_times_faster_with_a_voice_firs: 使用以语音为先的键盘，打字速度提高四倍。
voquill_is_built_in_the_open_join_our_di: Voquill is built in the open. Join our Discord to share feedback, request features, report bugs, or just hang out with other users. We're building this together.
voquill_uses_ai_to_clean_up_your_transcr: Voquill 使用 AI 清理您的文字记录。它会删除填充词、纠正小错误，并让您的话语听起来更自然。
voquill_works_system_wide_across_macos_w: Voquill 在 macOS、Windows 和 Linux 操作系统上运行。任何文字栏位，任何应用程序——您的声音都能使用。
voquill_your_keyboard_is_holding_you_bac: Voquill | 您的键盘正在拖累您。
we_couldn_t_find_the_page_you_were_looki: 我们找不到您要查找的页面。
works_at_the_speed_of_thought: Works at the speed of thought.
your_data_is_yours_period: 您的数据就是您的，绝无例外。
your_thoughts_move_faster_than_your_fing: Your thoughts move faster than your fingers ever will. Stop losing ideas to slow typing. Say what you're thinking and move on.
